attributes.action: Legislate to improve the safety of motorways and dual carriageways by planting the central reservations with suitable shrubs and bushes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By planting plant material that is dense and colourful the French authorities have already proved that it is feasible. It is my opinion that their motorways are more safe, less distracting and more pleasant to drive on.

The Main Benefits would be:-
Reduce headlight glare from oncoming traffic.
Reduce the effect of water spray that drifts across carriageways in very wet weather.
To improve road safety by forcing drivers to concentrate on events on the carriageway on which they are travelling, especially when incidents occur on the opposite carriageway  that cause drivers to drive unnessarily and dangerously slowly.
To improve the general ambience of the road system.
To hide the enormous quantities of roadside litter that impacts negatively on the countryside.
To reverse, to a degree, the negative ecological impact of road building by planting species that are particularily good at absorbing toxins produced from burning fossil fuels 
To provide a habitat for wildlife.
